title: Lens makes upright image smaller than object

content.prompt: An object is placed in front of a thin lens. An upright image is formed that is one-third the height of the object. If the image is 6.0 cm from the lens, what is the focal length of the lens?

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
